alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 13 at 11:57PM CST until December 14 at 12:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 1245 AM CST. * At 1157 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Manifest, or 20 miles north of Larto, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Jonesville and Manifest around 1205 AM CST. Wallace Ridge around 1215 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Harrisonburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
